q: the State of the Union. Republican Mike Pence , who's considering a run for Barack Obama , said he appreciated the Barack Obama 's`` affirmation of what makes this country great.'' But Mike Pence offered this caution: In Washington, the devil is always in the details. He went on to note,`` All his[ Barack Obama 's] answers called for bigger government. This is the challenge.''
